QAPair.Question: What is (are) Anastomosis ?
QAPair.Answer: Examples of surgical anastomoses are: Arteriovenous fistula (an opening created between an artery and vein) for dialysis , Colostomy (an opening created between the bowel and the skin of the abdominal wall), Intestinal, in which two ends of intestine are sewn together , A connection between a graft and a blood vessel to create a bypass ,
